Top Ability Rules: Consume an Attack Token. Make an attack against all entities within a box that is Y x Y. In addition, disperse X damage among the targets
Bottom Ability Rules: On success target reduces all rolls by X and takes X damage
General Notes: number of cards giving skill points: 16

Top Ability Rules: Discard a card. Target Ally may play an additional Ability in place of this action
Bottom Ability Rules: Target Ally may play an additional turn in place of this action. Skip your next turn

Top Ability Rules: On the next instance of damage being dealt to you, instead take no damage.
Bottom Ability Rules: On all instance of damage dealt to you, reduce it by X

Top Ability Rules: On success, target enemy rolls their next roll twice, then takes the lower sum
Bottom Ability Rules: Target ally rolls their next roll twice, taking the higher sum

Top Ability Rules: If your attack deals damage to target Enemy, then their next defense value against you is 0
Bottom Ability Rules: On your next Defense Roll you may choose to reduce it by Y. If you take damage then deal Y * X damage to the attacker

Top Ability Rules: Discard a card. Lay down spikes on a 1 x X space. You must be next to one of the squares in this space upon casting. Whenever an enemy walks onto the spiked spaces, they roll defense against X
Bottom Ability Rules: Discard a card. Throw your trap on a space within X feet. You may activate it at anytime. When it is activated, it explodes dealing Y damage to an enemy on the space it was placed and any enemies on an adjacent spaces.

Top Ability Rules: Target Ally plays an additional Top Action in place of this action. Return a card from discard to your hand
Bottom Ability Rules: You and target Ally return up to X cards from discard and heal up to X life.

Top Ability Rules: If you succeed, target enemy takes X damage, where X is equal to each card in your hand and deck
Bottom Ability Rules: If you succeed, roll influence and enemy takes the value as damage. You may exhaust a card from your deck and replay this action.

Top Ability Rules: Whenever target enemy takes an action, you may attack that enemy.
Bottom Ability Rules: Attack Target Enemy with your bare hand as the weapon. If damage is dealt, Target Enemy can only utilize movement during their next turn

Top Ability Rules: Consume an attack token. Throw a bomb at a square. It deals X damage to anything in that square. If something starts a turn on that square, they take X damage
Bottom Ability Rules: Consume a defense Token. Exhaust a card. Whenever an enemy attacks you they take Y damage

Top Ability Rules: If you succeed an influence roll on a marked target, attack that target. They cannot roll defense. Then remove that mark.
Bottom Ability Rules: Mark target. If you succeed return this card to your hand.

Top Ability Rules: If enemy is greater than 10 feet away, gain Y in defense against them
Bottom Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, target is pushed back 15 ft. If influence roll is successful, push target and adjacent enemies back 5 ft.

Top Ability Rules: Can intuit best path to target when target in influence range
Bottom Ability Rules: Detect the location of all enemies in a 30 ft. area around self

Top Ability Rules: Add influence to defense rolls
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, add influence value to attack values against that enemy

Top Ability Rules: Attack values are reduced by X in 5*Y area
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose point within range. Make an attack against each enemy in area of radius X around this spot

Top Ability Rules: Lose X Health, target heals up to X life
Bottom Ability Rules: All allies within 15 ft of your area heal for X on their turn

Top Ability Rules: Throw a mine to a spot within 20 feet. Any enemy movement on or in adjacent 5 feet of spot results in 2d6 damage
Bottom Ability Rules: In adjacent space create 3 consumable items. These items last up to X rounds and heal for up to X health.

Top Ability Rules: Target all enemies within 10 feet of you with influence roll. On success, deal 1d6 damage per target
Bottom Ability Rules: Create a barrier around yourself. If attacked, dispense Y damage to attacker

Top Ability Rules: Attack 2 enemies that are adjacent to each other
Bottom Ability Rules: After the attack, your next 10 feet of movement leaves behind an aura of damage. Passing on or through any of these 5ft. squares results in 1d4 damage

Top Ability Rules:
Gain 20 feet of movement. Double all movement this turn.
you may consume a defense token to instead put this in your hand
Bottom Ability Rules: After calculating the damage, determine if doubling the damage would be enough to kill the target. If so, kill the target. else, do no damage

Top Ability Rules: On success, reduce target movement by 10 ft. You may consume a defense token to reduce it by an addition 10 ft.
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose a 5 x 10 ft. area in range. All in area defend against X damage. You may consume an attack token to increase area of effect to 5x20

Top Ability Rules: Heal target for X. you may consume a defense token to double healing
Bottom Ability Rules: If target is marked, heal for X and then remove that mark

Top Ability Rules: For each enemy that targets you with an attack, mark that enemy
Bottom Ability Rules: Gain 15 ft. movement. If target is marked, they are forced to mimic your movement

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt you may consume one Influence Token to return 1 card from discard and heal for X
Bottom Ability Rules: When enemy moves, you may roll opposing Influence. On success, consume an influence token to stop their movement

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, enemy takes 1d4 damage at the start of your next turn. If attack token is used, damage happens for X turns
Bottom Ability Rules: Copy ability from an exhausted card, and use that ability in place of this ability

Top Ability Rules: Ally may discard one card and heal for X
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, determine which ally an enemy can target next turn

Top Ability Rules: Gain X summons (1 HP, 1d4 unblockable attack, 15 ft movement with flight)
Bottom Ability Rules: If downed, you may immediately play action. Gain X summons (1 HP, 2d4 attack, 5 ft movement)

Top Ability Die Roll/Scaler:
X = Level
Y = rounds kept in stasis * X
Top Ability Rules: Your ally may play this card in their stasis slot, or use it immediately. This card may be consumed and returned to your discard pile, granting the ally Y health and an extra action
Bottom Ability Rules: Reduce your health by X to apply buff to Ally. If Ally is downed in next round, they instead set their health to X

Top Ability Rules: Consume defense token on target to reduce their attack values by X
Bottom Ability Rules: If you defend against target's attack, consume a defense token to attack them back. Target does not roll defense

Top Ability Rules: Reduce your next defense value by X to return all player's contact tokens from target
Bottom Ability Rules: Consume defense token on target to prevent an overstep attack

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, reduce target's next attack by X
Bottom Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, you may consume an attack token. Target's defense is lowered by Y and movement reduced by 10 ft for X rounds

Top Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, consume an attack token and attack another target in range. If damage is dealt, attack another new target in range. repeat until an attack doesn't deal damage, or all targets in range are dealt damage
Bottom Ability Rules: If damage is dealt, you may consume an attack token. Target's Influence is lowered by X

Top Ability Rules: Reduce your next defense value by up to X and grant it to an ally
Bottom Ability Rules: Gain X health

Top Ability Rules: Gain 20 ft of movement. In a continuous path of length 15 ft you move through this turn, create an area of a damaging effect: You may sacrifice up to X in attack rolls to have the effect do 3dY damage
Bottom Ability Rules: Produce up to X consumables. These can be thrown up to 15 feet, and attack for 3d6 damage

Top Ability Rules: Create a band between yourself and an ally up to 10 feet. All who exist in this band take 1d6 damage, undefended
Bottom Ability Rules: Choose an adjacent ally. They may increase their attack and defense by 1d4

Top Ability Rules: Upon success, target cannot target you with any actions directly. You may consume an influence token to prevent target from targeting an additional ally directly
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, target cannot take actions and takes 1d4 damage each round. They must succeed another Influence contest to break free

Top Ability Rules: Choose a circular area of diameter 15 feet. No sounds enter or leave from this area
Bottom Ability Rules: 10 seconds of sounds can be stored in any object up to 1 ft sq in size. Information can be recalled at will, or with a passphrase spoken, within influence range

Top Ability Rules: On success, consume an attack token. Target takes 2d4 damage and has -2 to all rolls
Bottom Ability Rules: On success, consume an attack token. Target takes 1d6 damage and catches fire, taking this damage every turn until they spend an action to put it out.

Top Ability Rules: Target gains X temporary hit points. you may consume an influence token to also increase their defense for 1 round by X
Bottom Ability Rules: Ally may return 3 cards from discard
